description:
(Part 3 of 5)

Eventually I say to him, 'We need to get a little more provocative', to which he replies, 'OK, how do we do that?' I tell him that the main thing I do is nude modeling and that if we are to work together on a long term basis then he will eventually have to model nude. He isn't too sure about that at first so I keep snapping pictures of him in his athletic get-ups and he gets more comfortable. We pack up and leave the studio and start driving back to my house and Kody starts asking what all the nude modeling would entail and I explain things to him. By the time we reach my house he has agreed to do a 'test nude shoot' that night just to see how it is and if he feels comfortable doing it.

[Continued in Kody: An American Soldier 2 (4)]
title: Kody: An American Soldier 2 (3)
